commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: And now a penalty! Evander Kane gets called for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe. That's a costly one for the Oilers.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Absolutely. Florida's power play gets its first chance of the night. Bobrovsky has looked shaky, so a power-play goal here could really give the Panthers some breathing room.
